text:
Question 153) Brazil's soybean exports totaled 4.129 million tons in July 2012, and recorded an increase compared to July 2011, although there was a low compared to May 2012.
The quantity, in kilograms, of soybean exported by Brazil in July 2012 was
A) 4.129 × 103
B) 4.129 × 106
C) 4.129 × 109
D) 4.129 × 1012
E) 4.129 × 1015
